title: How to turn off Push Notifications on Pixel 3 but keep on vibrate and sound notifcations for an app?
content: I want to stop notifications from pushing down from the top of the screen, but still want to be notified by noise and vibration.  It is really distracting and annoying to have the notification push down when I'm using my phone.  Biggest offending apps are messages, WhatsApp, Gmail and Outlook.
